awd_titl_txt: YSP:  Learning Mathematics and Physics through Applications in Engineering -- EARLY ALERT
awd_abstract_narration: The Herff College of Engineering at Memphis State University will               initiate a four-week, commuter Young Scholars project in Engineering,           Mathematics and Physics for 16 students entering grade 9.                                                                                                       A ten-week pre-summer session will introduce concepts in algebra,               geometry and trigonometry which will be reinforced with laboratory              exercises involving surveying methods, electrical circuits, and queuing         problems.                                                                                                                                                       During the four-week summer session students will examine simple                hydraulic and modelling problems and develop a scale model of a proposed        construction project.                                                                                                                                           During the nine-week post-summer session career opportunities will be           explored.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
